Welcome to FeedMe - Deliverer
Before you get started please read the terms and conditions. As a deliverer I understand that if I accept and order it is my responsibility to pay for the order, deliver it as fast as possible, and follow the instructions given by the customer. In addition, I may not give out any personal information relating to the customer. Once the delivery is made you will give the receipt to the customer and then they will send a PayPal payment to your Paypal. This payment will consist of the total of the purchase, a $5 convenience/delivery charge, and an additional tip. To make sure that you apply by these conditions, and follow the customers instructions you will be charged a $10 security fee. This fee is to insure that all instructions are met, and the food gets delivered. Once upon delivery/payment the $10 will be refunded back to you.
